About Archives

  • Return of the John Smiths

    Sep 24, 2017 • english, technology, privacy • 2 donuts and a coffee

    With the advent of obstrusive Internet seach engines it has become increasingly easy to stalk your high school gym teacher’s ex-girlfriend’s dog. Keeping this mind residents of Christ City, Maryland have a novel scheme to offer – change your name to John Smith.

  • Ye Akashvani ka Dilli kendar hai

    Sep 22, 2017 • hindi, India, shorts • 1 min read

    Humari baaton mein goonjegi sarkar ki gaand ki boo. Hum aap tak pahunchayeinge sab khabarein sab se pehle, aur saath hi saath pesh karenge kuchh ranga-rang program jisse aap ka sarkar ki nitiyon mein vishwas badhega. Kyun ki akal ka naash, sab ka vikas.
